entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
